data.title: Our Investments
data.meta_description: Explore CPP Investments' private equity strategies and comparative advantages to acquire, manage and grow high-quality private companies worldwide.
data.text:
By applying our comparative advantages – scale, certainty of assets and our long investment horizon – our teams pursue the best opportunities worldwide.
